taxonomicnotes: Blyth (1860) described Cobitis zonalternans from Thailand. Kottelat (1990) placed the species under Acanthocobitis.
rationale: Acanthocobitis zonalternans is a widely distributed species distributed in Manipur in India, Myanmar and Thailand occurring in several drainages with no major widespread threats affecting its population.  It is therefore assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Chaudhry, S., Dahanukar, N., Barbhuiya, A.H., Rema Devi, K.R. & Juffe Bignoli, D.
